name: PRM
author: Danillo Nunes

sections.description: PRM: The Patrão Relationship Management! is the best and easiest way for you, content producer, to manage and bound together with your most important audience: The people who invest money on your project!
sections.installation:
1. Upload prm directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Hide undefined payment methods.
  • Log some error messages.

1.0.1

  • Fixed postal code validation for https-enabled sites.

1.0

  • Initial version launched.
